Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), gfortran, dh-sequence-fortran-mod, hwloc-nox, libhwloc-dev, librdmacm-dev [!hurd-any], libslurm-dev (>= 23.11) [!hurd-any], libibverbs-dev (>= 1.1.7) [!hurd-any], libfabric-dev [!hurd-any !powerpc !sh4], libnuma-dev [!hurd-any], libucx-dev [amd64 arm64 ppc64el riscv64 loong64], libpmix-dev [amd64 arm64 mips64el ppc64el riscv64 s390x loong64 alpha ppc64 sparc64], libxt-dev, procps, python3, quilt, txt2man, valgrind-if-available, x11proto-core-dev
Package-List: libmpich-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libmpich12 deb libs optional arch=any mpich deb devel optional arch=any mpich-doc deb doc optional arch=all
